boundary="----=_Part_125155_8339640.1177535287734" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.166.176 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.166.176; envelope-from=sstrumello@gmail.com; helo=py-out-1112.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Apr 2007 21:08:22.0078 (UTC) FILETIME=[DB270DE0:01C7877D] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Sender Information: C. Scott Strumello sstrumello@gmail.com Tel: 718-986-5797, no fax 5411 90th St Elmhurst, NY 11373 USA April 20, 2007 Recipient Information: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com 1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 c/o Copyright Agent for Notice of Claims of Copyright Infringement Sent via: fax and e-mail DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement re: [ooeoyi.com (IP 74.53.81.226)] Dear Sir or Madam: I, C. Scott Strumello, as the sole owner and creator of Scott's Web Log ( http://sstrumello.blogspot.com), certify under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing. Note that the extent of the infringement may be wider than those which have been addressed below, but these are a handful of materials believed to be in violation of copyright law. Note that the "content rights" section of the aforementioned blog clearly states: All Content (c) Copyright 2005, 2006, 2007 C. Scott Strumello. All rights reserved. Do not reproduce without written permission from the author. The infringing material is a domain name that is registered to Melbourne IT, Ltd., D/B/A Internet Names Worldwide on behalf of Yahoo Domains, but the domain is actually hosted by your organization, therefore this complaint is being addressed to you. My contact information is as follows: C. Scott Strumello, Scott's Web Log Sole Content Owner Tel: 718-986-5797, no fax 5411 90th St Elmhurst, NY 11373 USA Allegedly Infringing items or materials: Infringing address: http://se7c.ooeoyi.com/ (IP: 74.53.81.226) Infringing material that I request be disabled or removed in consideration of the above: http://se7c.ooeoyi.com/2005-Wrap-Up-and-Outlook-for-2006/ http://se7d.ooeoyi.com/Type-1-Diabetes-Vaccine-Being-Tested-in-Australia / http://se7c.ooeoyi.com/60-of-People-With-Type-2-Diabetes-Will-Suffer-Com plications/ http://n37k.ooeoyi.com/Pets-and-Diabetic-Owners/ http://se7h.ooeoyi.com/Successful-Islet-Cell-Transplant-Without-Immunosu ppressive-Therapy-In-Mice-With-Type-1-Diabetes/ Location of ORIGINAL WORKS: http://sstrumello.blogspot.com/2006/01/2005-wrap-up-and-outlook-for-2006 .html http://sstrumello.blogspot.com/2007/04/type-1-diabetes-vaccine-being-tes ted-in.html http://sstrumello.blogspot.com/2007/04/60-of-people-with-type-2-diabetes -will.html http://sstrumello.blogspot.com/2007/04/pets-and-diabetic-owners.html http://sstrumello.blogspot.com/2007/03/successful-islet-cell-transplant. html My actual or electronic signature follows, and a facsimile with my written signature has been faxed to 214-782-7756: Sincerely, /s/ C.
